about.what-is-it.title: What is Civic Stack?
about.what-is-it.text: Civic Stack is the place to get together and share civic tools from different countries and organizations for you to be able to adapt and use them in the place where you live.
about.goal.title: What is our goal?
about.goal.1: Our goal is to provide easy access to civic digital tools for activists organizations to encourage citizen participation and strengthen their organizational and decision-making processes.
about.goal.2: At the same time, we want the organizations that develop technology based on the work of others, collaborate with the work of others, rather than "reinventing the wheel".
about.what-information-is-available.titl: What information appears in Civic Stack?
about.what-information-is-available.text: In Civic Stack you will find useful information about each tool (app or web): aims, scope, its origin, its GitHub repository. It is crowdsourced data, and organizations can create their own profiles and upload your own tools.
In Civic Stack, all the tools you find —and all the tools you will find— are open source
